name: Short Circuit (kingoftheconnors)
description:
The adorable adventures of a taser on a mission! Shock your way through six battles using a variety of weapons and modules.

This game was made as a part of GMTK's 2021 game jam for the theme "Linked Together". Link Toast and Redd, and connect them with all enemies to electrocute them senseless!

FEATURES:
  • Quippy dialog by two robot best friends!
  • Six levels with a variety of enemies and abilities
  • New abilities unlocked every level
  • Two original songs
CONTROLS:

Short Circuit can be played with either the Keyboard or the Mouse!

  • Mouse controls: Left-click to select, Right-click to cancel
  • Keyboard controls: Up-down-left-right, Z to select, X to cancel
CONTRIBUTIONS:
  • Programming: KingoftheConnors
  • Music: FordAudioDesign
  • Art: All art assets are from penusbmic's fantastic sci-fi library of free assets: https://penusbmic.itch.io/
